common.noMatches: Ezali na eloko moko te oyo ekokani

profile.title: Profil ya Mosaleli
profile.mustLogin: Osengeli kokota libanda mpo na komona ba paramètres.
profile.autoTranslate: Kobongola nsango na ndenge ya automatique
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Lakisa nsango ya ebandeli elongo na oyo ebongolami
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Lakisa nsango ya ebandeli elongo na oyo ebongolami
profile.filterExplicit: Filtrer contenu oyo ezali polele makasi
profile.allowExplicitContent: Kopesa ndingisa ya contenu oyo ezali polele makasi
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Sekonde mpo na kolongola na automatique
profile.saveError: Libunga: Ebongi te kobomba ba paramètres
profile.noPrivateKey: Clé privée ezali te na appareil oyo mpo na kosalela export.
profile.setBackupPassword: Tia mot de passe mpo na kobatela sauvegarde na yo:
profile.backupDownloaded: Sauvegarde ebombami na mot de passe esimbami!
profile.exportFailed: Libunga na kosalela export ya clé
profile.enterBackupPassword: Koma mot de passe ya sauvegarde oyo:
profile.importSuccess: Clé privée eyokani mpe etieli na appareil oyo.
profile.importFailed: Libunga na kosalela import (mot de passe mabe to fichier ebebi).
profile.keysRotated: Ba clés ya sika esalemi mpe clé publique etieli.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Clé privée na yo ekendaka libanda te ya appareil oyo. Exporta kopie oyo ebombami na mot de passe mpo na kozongisa na appareil mosusu.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Ozali na plan ya ofele — salá options ya Sun/Moon awa. Upgradé mpo na kofungola ba thèmes mosusu.
profile.backupDesc: Salá sauvegardes ebombami na mot de passe mpo na ba clés na yo, mpe zongisa yango na appareil mosusu mpo na kosynchroniser.
profile.privacyBlurEnabled: Kobebisa nsango na miso na ndenge ya ndelo
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Kobebisa nsango soki application ezali te na nzela ya miso
profile.notifyOnCopy: Sambisa ngai soki nsango na ngai ekopiami
profile.followHint: Ba histoires na bango ekomonana na fil d’actualité ya ba oyo olandi soki batieli na mode ya Ba oyo balandi (to Public).
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Eloko moko ebungi na kati ya etá oyo.
profile.callTextForwardingTitle: Kofwd ba appels to/pe ba SMS
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Kofwd ba appels mpe ba SMS oyo ezali koya na telefone to email oyo esilí kozongisama. Ba appels/SMS oyo ebimi ekoki komonisa numéro ya Chatforia na yo.
profile.destinationPhoneForCalls: Numéro ya butu mpo na ba appels (E.164)

chat.selectPrompt: Pona chat to salle ya nsango mpo na kobanda kosolola
